messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Biohazard Alert

Confirmed outbreak of level 5 biohazard aboard Space Station 13. All personnel must contain the outbreak.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: after hearing reports of the species known as the blob on your station you are now under qaurintine have a nice day!

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Apparently I died but im back

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Centcomm speaking... As the blob is about to gain critical mass, we all advise you to seek safe haven on lavaland. Do not forget to wash your teeth put on your clothes and have a nice day!   :)

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Biohazard Alert

Biohazard has reached critical mass. Station loss is imminent.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Alright, this is centcomm speaking, for real this time, we're sending in a deathsquad to eliminate the blob. Until we arrive, try to contain it.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: ..Houston, we have a problem. Space Station 13 is FUCKING GONE.
